snippet: A press briefing by American and Afghan commanders on insider attacks led to complaints, and a wider cultural discussion.
abstract: Mood sours during press briefing by American and Afghan commanders on insider attacks as several Afghan journalists complain about ill treatment by coalition security; complaints trigger larger discussion of cultural insensitivities shown by American military personnel.
lead_paragraph: A press briefing by American and Afghan commanders on insider attacks led to complaints, and a wider cultural discussion.

headline.main: Culture Clash With Afghans on Display at Briefing
headline.print_headline: Culture Clash With Afghans On Display At Briefing

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
